trans-unit.source: Notify me of new comments by e-mail
trans-unit.target: Obavjesti me o novim komentarima putem e-maila

trans-unit.source: You need to be logged in to add comments.

%s has created a new comment on your website.
---
%s
---
View: %s Edit: %s
If you are moderating comments, you have to log in to the back end to publish it.
trans-unit.target: %s je stavio novi kometar na vašu stranicu.⏎ ⏎ ---⏎ ⏎ %s⏎ ⏎ ---⏎ ⏎ Prikaži: %s⏎ Uredi: %s⏎ ⏎ Ako moderirate komentare, logirajte se u adminstraciju kako bi mogli objaviti komentar.

trans-unit.source: Your comment has been added and is now pending for approval.
trans-unit.target: Vaš komentar je dodan i čeka odobrenje.

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
please confirm that you want to be notified of new comments by e-mail on this page:
%s
---
Confirm: %s Cancel: %s
trans-unit.target: Pozdrav %s,⏎ ⏎ molim Vas potvrdite da želite biti obavješteni o novim komentarima na ovoj stranici putem e-maila :⏎ ⏎ %s⏎ ⏎ ---⏎ ⏎ Potvrdi: %s⏎ Otkaži: %s\n

trans-unit.source: A new comment has been added on %s

Hello %s,
a new comment has been added on a page you have subscribed to:
%s
---
To cancel your subscription, please click here: %s
trans-unit.target:
Pozdrav %s,
 
 novi komentar je dodan na stranicu na koju ste pretplačeni:⏎ 
 %s
 
 ---
 
 Za otkazivanje pretplate kliknite ovdje:
